metadata.synopsis: Wulbren has asked the player to get 'tools'. Player has to throw the tool to him in the cell. In this instance, player has thrown something to him he can't use.
metadata.how_to_trigger: Load act 2, teleport to Wulbren (he's in the prison in Moonrise). Speak to wulbren and persuade him you're here to help - he'll ask you to get 'tools'. Throw him something he can't use (like a dagger or shovel) and these will trigger.

0.speaker: Wulbren Bongle
0.text: Gaerdal help me - how about a club? A hammer? Hurry!
0.context: NodeContext: on the brink of losing his temper, trying to sound authorative but he really just wants to call the player an idiot

1.speaker: Wulbren Bongle
1.text: In what realm could this break rock? Stop messing about.

2.speaker: Wulbren Bongle
2.text: This is no good - I need something that can crack stone.
2.context: NodeContext: a little annoyed but trying not to sound it. Player has thrown wulbren a tool he can't use
